item.description:
I've postponed this meetup to try to get more people to attend. It's a little bit of short notice for some of you! We will officially meet on Friday, February 6th at 7pm at Vacationland Bowling in Saco! I look forward to seeing all of you there!

You will be responsible for paying for your own bowling and shoe rental.

Bowling! Do you need to get out and have some plain old fun?! Then this is for you. We'll meet up at 7 am spend a couple hours bowling.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in jeans and a green t-shirt.... Just look for the short girl! lol
item.name: Portland 20, 30, 40-Somethings February Meetup
